other_tests.findings: No significant drop of signal on the T1 out-of-phase images to indicate the presence of significant hepatic steatosis. The liver has a homogeneous signal, without focal mass lesion. No intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation. The common duct measures up to 8 mm in diameter. A 7 mm cystic focus is seen adjacent to the pancreatic tail. Smaller punctate cysts may also be present along the body and uncinate of the pancreas, but less than 5 mm in size. Moderate-sized axial hiatal hernia present. Dominant left-sided renal cyst measuring 3.7 cm, and several sub cm renal cysts also within the bilateral kidneys. Trace pleural fluid seen, perhaps physiologic.
